      • isServerSourceChannelRequired

        protected boolean isServerSourceChannelRequired()
        Description copied from class: MediaStream
        Overridden in derived classes to indicate whether server-to-client packet channels are required by the presentation or media stream. When mode is "play" the server-to-client channels are used to send media packets to the client. When mode is "record" the server-to-client channels are used to send receiver reports to the client.
        Specified by:
        isServerSourceChannelRequired in class MediaStream
        Returns:

      • isClientSourceChannelRequired

        protected boolean isClientSourceChannelRequired()
        Description copied from class: MediaStream
        Overridden in derived classes to indicate whether client-to-server packet channels are required by the presentation or media stream. When mode is "play" the client-to-server channels are used to send receiver reports to the client. When mode is "record" the client-to-server channels are used to send media packets to the client.
        Specified by:
        isClientSourceChannelRequired in class MediaStream
        Returns:

      • constructServerPacketSource

        protected MessageSource<ByteBuffer> constructServerPacketSource(int layerIndex,
                                                    int channelIndex,
                                                    OutputChannel<ByteBuffer> packetSink)
                                                         throws javax.sdp.SdpException,
                                                                IOException
        Specified by:
        constructServerPacketSource in class MediaStream
        Parameters:
        layerIndex - - The stream layer index.
        channelIndex - - The index used to select a port within a layer (e.g. 0=RTP and 1=RTCP).
        packetSink - - The output channel that will receive packets generated by the packet source.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        javax.sdp.SdpException
